attributes.action: Limite to one parliament or five years the length of time one may serve as Chancellor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring in a law which would never again allow any person, in the future, to hold the office of chancellor of the exchequer for more than one parliament or five years, which ever would be the longest.  Had this been the case, Mr Brown would never been able to keep the 'books' so secret and 'tight to his chest' and the terrible, eye-watering borrowing which we now face may have been avoided or at least lessened.
